Text: Oi Pico, I just got a new transmission from [color=yellow]Sgt. Fulp[/color].
Turns out those Uberkids are back at it again...
God dammit what have they done now.
Apparently they've developed a giant ass bomb to detonate the city.
Our reports would indicate that they're operating from within [color=red]their factory[/color].
Damn, I'll meet you there then.
